i like counterstrike. This games has helped me over the past 5 years make my bank account go to shamblez. uwu xD
petit jeu indé qui paye pas de mine
nanana buenardo, sabe como mete tirooooo jaaaa

Things I gave Counter-Strike:
1. Money
2. Time
3. Love

Things Counter-Strike gave me:
1. Arthritis
2. 9/10 ready
3. "gg ez" spam
4. Multilingual cursing
5. Lag
6. Cheaters
7. 64 Tick Servers
8. A 6 year old kid that slept with my mother

Essentially CS:GO is a greedy women, but I love her all the time

11/10 Would play again
If you have prime its a super fun game to play

This is the perfect game, so expect : russians / kids / toxic people / nerds / blind kids screaming/ people who impersonate pro players (only by name and picture not at all with skills  -  a gn3 scream while ranking up) and mostly, turkish / russians who wont speak english, wont even try to help you, they will just kick u out and report so you lose your trust factor further more.

Bu oyun kadar sacma oyun yok.Hileler zaten almış başını gidiyor.
YAŞASIN VALORANT 
CS GO NUN AMK

Things Counter-Strike gave me:
1. Arthritis
2. Rage
3, Hatred of Russians, Spanish, and Russians
4. Broken keyboard
5. Broken mouse
6. 9/10 ready
7. Server crashes
8. Retard teammates
9. Competitive matches
10. "Ez Pz" spam
11. Multilingual cursing - I guess this is a good thing?
12. Lag
13. Cheaters
14- 64 tick servers

Essentially - CS is a greedy woman, but I love her all the time.
Играл очень давно и много, нравится баланс игры где нет доната и решает только скилл. Рекомендую играть не более 500 часов
Pure non pay to win fun and rage!

Enquanto não separarem os servidores brasileiros do resto da américa latina e fazer o VAC funcionar de maneira decente esse jogo só servirá pra deixar estressado. Não existe sensação pior q dar queue pra um comp e ver q vc caiu com 4 boludos em call.
Very good but skin system is doo doo
its good game but there is so much cheaters
классная игра только читаров ебаных много

U této hry jsem probil 2 monitory, rozbil 3 myši, jednu klávesnici a na druhé vybil pár tlačítek a 2 sluchátka. Pokud někdo zvažuje koupi této hry, má rád ruštinu, víceméně v každé hře jednoho ruského taťku který hraje se svým synátorem, rád se dozví pravdu o svých rodičích a co vlastně dělají ve svém volném čase, užívá si solo hraní 1v5 a je schopný užívat nějaké stimulanty, aby tu hru zvládl hrát déle než 1 hodinu denně, pak si myslím že Counter Strike: Global Offensive bude asi ta nejlepší volba

В эту помойку нельзя играть даже с праймом, ведь VALVE не могут сделать обычный анти чит который будет серьезно работать. Это к тому что человек может играть с софтом на протяжении недели а то и больше, при этом его не забанит вак баном, только патруль в этой ситуации как то поможет
